我实在是无力翻译了，我英死早，又怕你连不上外网，就给你原文吧。Class UUIDjava.lang.Object  java.util.UUIDAll Implemented Interfaces:Serializable, Comparable<UUID>public final class UUIDextends Objectimplements Serializable, Comparable<UUID>A class that represents an immutable universally unique identifier (UUID). A UUID represents a 128-bit value.There exist different variants of these global identifiers. The methods of this class are for manipulating the Leach-Salz variant, although the constructors allow the creation of any variant of UUID (described below).The layout of a variant 2 (Leach-Salz) UUID is as follows: The most significant long consists of the following unsigned fields: 0xFFFFFFFF00000000 time_low 0x00000000FFFF0000 time_mid 0x000000000000F000 version 0x0000000000000FFF time_hi The least significant long consists of the following unsigned fields: 0xC000000000000000 variant 0x3FFF000000000000 clock_seq 0x0000FFFFFFFFFFFF node The variant field contains a value which identifies the layout of the UUID. The bit layout described above is valid only for a UUID with a variant value of 2, which indicates the Leach-Salz variant.The version field holds a value that describes the type of this UUID. There are four different basic types of UUIDs: time-based, DCE security, name-based, and randomly generated UUIDs. These types have a version value of 1, 2, 3 and 4, respectively.For more information including algorithms used to create UUIDs, see RFC 4122: A Universally Unique IDentifier (UUID) URN Namespace, section 4.2 "Algorithms for Creating a Time-Based UUID".

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
UUID 是通用唯一识别码（英语：Universally Unique Identifier，简称UUID）
在Minecraft里面（特别是1.7开始）UUID是用来验证玩家的
比如说每一个正版 Mojang都会给予一个UUID 官方验证的不是名称 而是UUID

你说的文本里，没有UUID码。
服务器保存玩家mod信息的文件夹里，不是每个玩家名的文件,而是UUID码为名字的文件，虽然文件不会修改，但是可以改名字替换，也可以做备份使用，但过程都需要知道哪个UUID对应哪个玩家，所以想要一个转换的方法额。

replies.author: langyo
replies.txt_content:
另外告诉你，那个xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx是原来的UUID（通用唯一识别码），到后来还要转换成UUIDmost（原来UUID的前半部分）和UUIDleast（原来UUID的后半部分）

为什么Jeb他要这么做呢？这是为了节省游戏数据的存储空间，原来的UUID占了的内存所用的数据类型算是一个大数据类型，还有很多的空档没利用，在生物生成时就转换下，把原来的不大不小的数据给分成2个小数据，这样子就能正好塞满2个小数据类型，还不浪费（节约环保啊………………）内存……
